thread.title: Vincent Kompany's injury woes continue as he misses Manchester City's FA Cup clash with Huddersfield
thread.title_full: Vincent Kompany's injury woes continue as he misses Manchester City's FA Cup clash with Huddersfield

author: Jim Daly
title: Vincent Kompany's injury woes continue as he misses Manchester City's FA Cup clash with Huddersfield
text:
Sport Vincent Kompany's injury woes continue as he misses Manchester City's FA Cup clash with Huddersfield The Belgian did not train on Friday after picking up a fresh injury and will miss City's trip to the John Smith's Stadium Share Vincent Kompany has picked up yet another injury (Photo: Reuters) Share Get   
Vincent Kompany 's injury woes don't appear to be letting up as the Manchester City captain was forced out of their FA Cup fifth round clash at Huddersfield. 
The Belgian centre-back had been expected to start against the Terriers as Pep Guardiola gradually brought him back from the latest set-back. 
But Kompany did not train on Friday after picking up a fresh injury and will miss City's trip to the John Smith's Stadium. 
Kompany has made one appearance in 2017, playing the full 90 minutes in City's 3-0 FA Cup win at Crystal Palace three weeks ago. Vincent Kompany was returning from an injury picked up at Palace last year (Photo: Hannah McKay/Reuters) Vincent Kompany has had multiple previous injuries (Photo: Michael Regan/Getty) Vincent Kompany receiving treatment is a common sight at Man City (Photo: Action Images via Reuters / Jason Cairnduff) 
Guardiola and his medical team have used Kompany sparingly as the 30-year-old makes his way back from the latest setback of an injury-ravaged period 
The latest set-back is not thought to be major but will be a blow to the City captain as he tries to return from yet another injury. poll loading Will Vincent Kompany ever be a first-team regular for Man City again? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
